thread.title: Ariana Grande teases video with music star Andrea Bocelli
thread.title_full: Ariana Grande teases video with music star Andrea Bocelli - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ariana Grande teases video with music star Andrea Bocelli
text:
Singer Ariana Grande teased her fans with the snippets of music video her duet with Italian classical music star Andrea Bocelli.
READ: â€‹ Ariana Grande kisses friend, shares video
The 22-year-old took to Facebook to share the clip in which she is seen performing the ballad with Bocelli, 57, superimposed over a city background, reported Aceshowbiz.
For latest Music updates
"The music video for 'E Piu Te Penso' with Andrea Bocelli comes out next Tuesday Oct 13th on Vevo!," she captioned the video.
 pictures updates
Listen to Ariana Grande on Gaana.com
"To have a record with Andrea is just so surreal and so special, and something that I never thought would happen," the 'Break Free' hitmaker previously said.
WATCH: Ariana Grande - One Last Time (Official)
